channel.title: Pls help i'm kind of new (paul's world source and client)
channel.description:
I'm using Paul's world source and client. not changed anything in client or source. where do I put ip in client and source? and what do I need to give other people to run? source and client is found here https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,518927.0.html compiler is working fine.
3 years and still not ever managed to put up an rsps that other people can actually join LOL :P
pls help,
thanks
grandstinger

item.title: Pls help i'm kind of new (paul's world source and client)
item.dc:creator: @xX4m4zingXx xX4m4zingXx
item.description:
@xX4m4zingXx wrote:

open client.java client sided
search for server =
you will find something like this:

//server = "5.81.7.89"; //hamachi server = "pauls-world.no-ip.biz";
the first line of code

you can delete that
and in the other line
you have to change the pauls-word.no-ip.biz to your ip
then save then compile

Read full topic
item.source: Pls help i'm kind of new (paul's world source and client)

item.title: Pls help i'm kind of new (paul's world source and client)
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“xX4m4zingXx, post:4, topic:541383”]Send me a pm! If you give me your skype name then i will add you and i will help you.[/quote]We have help boards for a reason, stop telling people to add you on other means of communication and use the forum like it was intended.

Read full topic

item.title: Pls help i'm kind of new (paul's world source and client)
item.dc:creator: @grandstinger grandstinger
item.description:
@grandstinger wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:2, topic:541383”]You need to portforward, then change the IP in the client.[/quote] Ik how to port forward, but Idk where to change the ip in the client and source? and also idk what I need to give other people.
pls help. thx.

Read full topic
